trans-unit.source: Azure AD and Applications: Requiring User Assignment | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD and Applications: Requiring User Assignment | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to require user assignment for Azure applications.
trans-unit.target: How to require user assignment for Azure applications.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD and Applications: Requiring User Assignment
trans-unit.target: Azure AD and Applications: Requiring User Assignment

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Azure portal with an administrator account.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the Azure portal with an administrator account.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **All Items** item in the main menu.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **All Items** item in the main menu.

trans-unit.source: Choose the directory you are using for the application.
trans-unit.target: Choose the directory you are using for the application.

trans-unit.source: Select the application from the list of applications associated with this directory.
trans-unit.target: Select the application from the list of applications associated with this directory.

trans-unit.source: Change the **User Assignment Required to Access App** toggle to Yes.
trans-unit.target: Change the **User Assignment Required to Access App** toggle to Yes.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Save** button at the bottom of the screen.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Save** button at the bottom of the screen.

trans-unit.source: You will now have to assign users and/or groups to the application.
trans-unit.target: You will now have to assign users and/or groups to the application.

trans-unit.source: See [Assigning users to an application](active-directory-guiding-developers-assigning-users.md) and [Assigning groups to an application](active-directory-guiding-developers-assigning-groups.md).
trans-unit.target: See [Assigning users to an application](active-directory-guiding-developers-assigning-users.md) and [Assigning groups to an application](active-directory-guiding-developers-assigning-groups.md).
